basic.floral_language:
Agave univittata 
Floriography: selfless, fortitude, love.
Agave univittata is a compact evergreen succulent plant. Leaves rosulately arranged, triangular or lanceolate with spines at edges. Besides ornamental cultivation, its applications include anti-bacteria, anti-inflammation, and etc.
This plant requires much sunlight but should be shaded during the noon of summer. Yellowish green flowers bloom occasionally.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow green flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green or green and yellow in mixture

maintenance.soil: Peat soil or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes adequate sunshine, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, water more frequently in summer, reduce water in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, in summer and autumn apply fertilizers once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead, yellowish and disease leaves timely
